jailPlayer

@Deprecated
public void jailPlayer(java.lang.String playerName,
                                  int time,
                                  java.lang.String jailName,
                                  java.lang.String reason)
Deprecated. use jailPlayer(String playerName, int time, String jailName, String cellName, String reason)

Jail specified player

Parameters:
playerName - Name of the player you want to jail
time - Jail time in minutes
jailName - Name of the jail, where prisoner will be jailed. Use null to let plugin select nearest jail.
reason - Reason for jailing. Use null if you don't want to specify reason.

                               int time,
                               java.lang.String jailName,
                               java.lang.String cellName,
                               java.lang.String reason)
Jail specified player

Parameters:
playerName - Name of the player you want to jail
time - Jail time in minutes
jailName - Name of the jail, where prisoner will be jailed. Use null to let plugin select nearest jail.
cellName - Name of the cell, where prisoner will be jailed.
reason - Reason for jailing. Use null if you don't want to specify reason.

jailPlayer

public JailPrisoner jailPlayer(java.lang.String playerName,
                               int time,
                               java.lang.String jailName,
                               java.lang.String cellName,
                               java.lang.String reason,
                               java.lang.String jailer)
Jail specified player

Parameters:
playerName - Name of the player you want to jail
time - Jail time in minutes
jailName - Name of the jail, where prisoner will be jailed. Use null to let plugin select nearest jail.
cellName - Name of the cell, where prisoner will be jailed.
reason - Reason for jailing. Use null if you don't want to specify reason.
jailer - Who jailed this player? Usually name of your plugin.

isPlayerJailed

public java.lang.Boolean isPlayerJailed(java.lang.String playerName)
Check if is specified player jailed

Parameters:
playerName - name of the player you want to check
Returns:
true if player is jailed, false if he is not jailed

InsertJailZone

public void InsertJailZone(JailZone zone)
Insert new jail zone into jail system. Useful for example when your plugin creates its own jail zone.

Parameters:
zone - new zone you want to insert into jail system.

InsertPrisoner

public void InsertPrisoner(JailPrisoner prisoner)
Insert new prisoner into jail system. Use if you want to jail someone manually.

Parameters:
prisoner - new prisoner that you want to insert into jail system
